source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW absence_dim_new_non_null

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    Staff_Number,
    Attendance_or_Absence_Type,
    Sickness_Group,
    Annual_Leave_Start,
    Start_Date,
    End_Date,
    Days,
    hrs,
    Cal_Days,
    hrs_day,
    wkdys,
    wk_hrs,
    Work_Schedule_Rule,
    expected_from

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_absences
WHERE Staff_Number IS NOT NULL AND Attendance_or_Absence_Type IS NOT NULL AND Staff_Number = '00500001';

SELECT count(*) FROM absence_dim_new_non_null;

# absence_dim
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data view (vw_absences) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.absence_dim)
- **New Data:** where a PA in the source does not exist as an EmployeeID in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on PA in source and EmployeeID in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'

## View absence_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build absence_dim table
-- Gets modified or new from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW absence_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Staff_Number IS NULL
        THEN T3.AbsenceID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS AbsenceID, -- surrogate key
    T1.Staff_Number                 AS EmployeeID,
    T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type   AS AbsenceType,
    T1.Sickness_Group               AS SicknessGroup,
    T1.Start_Date                   AS AbsenceStartDate,
    T1.End_Date                     AS AbsenceEndDate,
    T1.Days                         AS Days,
    T1.hrs                          AS Hours,
    T1.Cal_Days                     AS CalendarDays,
    T4.WorkScheduleID               AS WorkScheduleID,
    T1.Annual_Leave_Start           AS AnnualLeaveStart,
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.Staff_Number,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type,'.'),
            IFNULL(CAST(T1.Start_Date AS VARCHAR(20)),'.'),
            IFNULL(CAST(T1.End_Date AS VARCHAR(20)),'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.Hrs,'.'))) 
                                    AS RowID,
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM absence_dim_new_non_null T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2   ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_work_schedule_dim T4     ON T4.WorkScheduleRule = T1.Work_Schedule_Rule AND 
                                                            T4.WorkWeekDays = T1.WkDys AND 
                                                            T4.WorkWeekHours = T1.Wk_hrs AND   
                                                            T4.WorkDayHours = T1.Hrs_Day AND 
                                                            T4.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim T3           ON T1.Staff_Number = T3.EmployeeID AND 
                                                            T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type = T3.AbsenceType AND 
                                                            T1.Start_Date = T3.AbsenceStartDate AND 
                                                            T1.End_Date = T3.AbsenceEndDate AND
                                                            T1.hrs = T3.Hours AND 
                                                            T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
--         -- flags new data        
--         ( CASE
--             WHEN T1.Staff_Number = T3.EmployeeID AND 
--                     T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type = T3.AbsenceType AND 
--                     T1.Start_Date = T3.AbsenceStartDate AND 
--                     T1.End_Date = T3.AbsenceEndDate AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.Staff_Number,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type,'.'), IFNULL(CAST(T1.Start_Date AS VARCHAR(20)),'.'), IFNULL(CAST(T1.End_Date AS VARCHAR(20)),'.'), IFNULL(T1.Hrs,'.'))) <> T3.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
--             THEN 'Y'
--             WHEN T3.EmployeeID IS NULL -- new employee
--             THEN 'Y'
--             ELSE 'N'
--         END  = 'Y' ) 
-- AND 
T1.Staff_Number IS NOT NULL AND Staff_Number = '00500001';

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **absence_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View absence_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Creating new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW absence_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- SELECT 
--     AbsenceID,
--     EmployeeID,
--     AbsenceType,
--     SicknessGroup,
--     AbsenceStartDate,
--     AbsenceEndDate,
--     Days,
--     Hours,
--     CalendarDays,
--     WorkScheduleID,
--     AnnualLeaveStart,
--     SourceSystemID,
--     IngestionDate,
--     ValidTo,
--     RowID,
--     IsActive
-- FROM absence_dim_new T5 WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

--     UNION ALL

SELECT
    T4.AbsenceID,
    T4.EmployeeID,
    T4.AbsenceType,
    T4.SicknessGroup,
    T4.AbsenceStartDate,
    T4.AbsenceEndDate,
    T4.Days,
    T4.Hours,
    T4.CalendarDays,
    T4.WorkScheduleID,
    T4.AnnualLeaveStart,
    T4.SourceSystemID,
    T4.IngestionDate,
    T4.ValidTo,
    T4.RowID,
    T4.IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim T4
WHERE EmployeeID IN (SELECT EmployeeID FROM absence_dim_new WHERE AbsenceID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

# View absence_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Staff_Number from vw_absences), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.absence_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim AS Target
USING absence_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.AbsenceID = Target.AbsenceID 

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(date_sub(Source.IngestionDate,1)),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.absence_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new WorkScheduleID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AbsenceID NULLS LAST) AS AbsenceID,
    EmployeeID,
    AbsenceType,
    SicknessGroup,
    AbsenceStartDate,
    AbsenceEndDate,
    Days,
    Hours,
    CalendarDays,
    WorkScheduleID,
    AnnualLeaveStart,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim;
